Good morning, and welcome to the Black Mesa Transit System. This automated train is provided for the security and convenience of the Black Mesa Research Facility personnel. The time is eight-forty seven A.M... Current outside temperature is ninety three degrees with an estimated high of one hundred and five. The Black Mesa compound is maintained at a pleasant sixty-eight degrees at all times. This train is inbound from Level Three dormitories to Sector C Test Labs and Control Facilities. If your intended destination is a high security area beyond Sector C, you will need to return to the Central Transit hub in Area Nine and board a high security train. If you have not yet submitted your identity to the retinal clearance system, you must report to Black Mesa personel for processing before you will be permitted into the high security branch of the transit system. Due to the high toxicity of material routinely handled in the Black Mesa compound, no smoking, eating, or drinking are permitted within the Black Mesa Transit System. Please keep you limbs inside the train at all times. Do not attempt to open the doors until the train has come to a complete halt at the station platform. In the event of an emergency, passengers are to remain seated and await further instruction. If it is necessary to exit the train, disabled personnel should be evacuated first. Please, stay away from electrified rails, and proceed to an emergency station until assistance arrives. A reminder that the Black Mesa Hazard Course decathlon will commence this evening at 1900 hours in the Level Three facility. The semi-finals for high security personnel will be announced in a separate secure access transmission. Remember, more lives than your own may depend on your fitness. Do you have a friend or relative who make a valuable addition to the Black Mesa team? Immediate openings are available in the areas of "Materials Handling" and "Low Clearance Security." Please contact Black Mesa personnel for further information. If you have an associate with a background in the areas of "Theoretical Physics," "Biotechnology," or other high-tech disciplines, please contact our civilian recruitment division. The Black Mesa Research Facility is an equal-opportunity employer. A reminder to all Black Mesa personnel: Regular radiation and biohazard screenings are a requirement of continued employment in the Black Mesa Research Facility. Missing a scheduled urinalisys or radiation check-up is grounds for immediate termination. If you feel you have been exposed to radioactive or other hazardous materials in the course of your duties, contact your radiation safety officer immediately. Work safe, work smart. Your future depends on it. Now arriving at Sector C Test Labs and Control Facilities. Please stand back from the automated door and wait for the security officer to verify your identity. Before exiting the train, be sure to check your area for personal belongings. Thank you, and have a very safe, and productive day.

This is more like my feelings towards this awesome work of art rather than a mere review for an old game. HλLF - LIFE... My alpha and omega, my all time favorite. This game resonates with every single cell I have within my mortal shell. It never ever gets old for me. I'm 27, got it while I was around 8, (I mostly watched my older brother playing it at that time) never had the absence of it since. Every new pc I owned, every operating system I installed, had to have Half-Life ready to go. Had my original disk shattered while moving to a new house about 11 years ago. A little part of me died that day. I'd still have the same goosebumps if I get to hear that lambda alarm sound during install that checks your sound driver. Half-Life's nostalgia factor plus it's awesomeness creates the kind of joy in me that impossible to put in simple words. Like love.

[u] Gameplay [/u]
Half-Life is a first-person shooter that requires the player to perform combat tasks and puzzle solving to advance through the game.

[u] Review [/u]
I used to play this game when I was a lot younger but I was never able to complete it due to my age. I finally got round to playing Half-Life again many years down the line and boy have I missed this! The old FPS format is just amazing and how the game is set out is such a joy to play. If you get the opportunity to play this game don't pass it up because you won't see a game like this one ever again.

Tras Haber Comprado El Pack De Valve En Rebajas De Verano Y No Tener Ni Idea De Que Existiera Esta Saga Y Sin Interesarme De Lo Que Iba Cuando Oi Hablar De Algo(Lo Cual Es Un Pecado.)Decidi Empezar La Saga Con El Primer Titulo,Logicamente.Fue El Primer Juego Que Me Introdujo A Los Juegos Tan Famosos Y Tan Vendidos De Esta Comunidad De Steam(Como Es Asi,Por Ejemplo,Counter Strike O Portal,Los Cuales Estaban Hechos Con Los Mismos Motores Utilizados En Half Life 1(El Motor Goldsource.)O En Algunas Entregas Una mejora De Este Antiguo Motor.Desde El Principio,Hasta Empezar El Juego No me Atrevia A Jugar Juegos Tan Antiguos Como Este De 1998,Creia Que No Me Iban A Gustar,Pero Resulta Que Al Empezar El Juego Y Empezar O Jugar Otros Hechos Por Valve O De Ese Tipo Me Encantaron.La Historia Desde El Principio Es Atrapante,Cuando Empiezas Desde Un Tren En Marcha,Viendo Elementos Del Escenario Que Te Preguntas Que Son O Algunas Personas Que Quienes Son,Pero Que Sin Embargo Interactuan Desde El Comienzo De La Aventura muy Bien Con El Escenario.Esto Nos Empieza A Indicar,Desde Este Punto Hasta El Final Del Juego,Donde Los NPCS Pueden Desde Interactuar Con paneles O Ordenadores Hasta Poder Seguirnos Y Disparar Enemigos,Hasta Proteger A Otros Aliados,Que La IA O inteligencia Artificial Es Muy Buena,Incluso Superando A La IA De Algunos Juegos Actuales(Y Eso Que Es Un Juego Del Año 1998.),Pero Que Sin Embargo,En Mi Opinion,Se Mejoro En La Segunda Entrega De La Saga.Aqui Es Donde Empezo Todo,Desde El Primer Traje H.E.V TTmark4 Hasta La Palanca O Crowbar Que Recojemos Despues Del Incidente En Black Mesa,Unas Instalaciones Relacionadas Con Experimentos Cientificos,Con Ingenieros Cientificos Y Guardias De Seguridad,Equipados Con Chaleco Y Casco De Kevlar Y Con Su Arma Reglamentaria Para Proteger A Los Cientficos O Incluso A Nosotros.La Verdad Es Que La Trama Del juego No Es Nada Del Otro Mundo Como Una Tipica Trama De Peliculas De Ciencia Ficcion De Serie B,Aunque Le Da Un Toque De Misterio Y De Sospecha,Que Nos Da Mas Preguntas Que Respuestas A Lo Largo De El.Ademas,A Lo Largo Del Juego Vamos Descubriendo Tanto Armas De Fuego Como Armas Melee(Aunque Escasas,Contando la Palanca.)Hasta Armas Alienigenas Que Nos Preguntaremos Como Se Usan Y Cuales Son Todas Y Cada Una De Sus Funciones,Asi Como tambien Las Especies Alienigenas Que Nos Iremos Encontrando En Black mesa Con Unas Claras Caracteristicas Y A Unos Militares Que Quieren Aniquilar A Todo Lo Que Se Encuentre por El Camino.Con Lo Unico Que No Estoy De Acuerdo Del Titulo Es Su Precio En Steam.Recomendaria Comprarlo De Rebajas O Mejor Aun,Junto A Otras Aventuras Y Juegos De Valve Con El Pack De Valve Rebajado Al Maximo En Las Rebajas De Verano.Sin Duda Alguna,una Joya Que Deberia Estar En La Biblioteca De Los Amantes De Los FPS.

Este juego lo he jugado y rejugado muchas veces en los ultimos... muchos años, y siempre me sigue gustando, tal vez porque descubro nuevos detalles, porque aunque lo conozco de memoria nunca es igual y repetitivo, y la historia es simplemente una de las mejores del mundo de los FPS... este es uno de esos juegos que todos los gamers deberían probar al menos una vez en la vida, aunque los gráficos no sean actuales, eso es lo de menos, la historia y la jugabilidad y la IA son geniales....

A few years after i beat half life 2. My brother bought me half life 1. And holy damn was it worth it.
In half life 1 you have less story. Which is a let down. Since i wanted to hear more story. They showed the black mesa incident. And all that. But because there is less story. There is more action around every corner. And the monsters and weapon variety is way bigger. The final levels were crazy hard. The final boss was really cool too. 
I would reccomend this game if you're a fan of lots of action and less story since the game is always fast spawning in enemys every turn you take. 9.5/10
-Sarkastikor

Originally, I had given Half-Life a negative review because I couldn't get past a certain part. However, after a little bit of definitely not cheating, I managed to make it through the game and defeat the final boss without using cheats (although dying many times). The game got much better after getting past that part I was stuck on (the part where you are fighting the military while in a minecart), so I must now recommend this game. 
Rating:9/10

首先我来说一下这款游戏不好的地方吧，就是特别容易迷路，这对新玩家非常的不友好，这样迷路迷久了就会失去在玩下去的精力，有些玩家可能就忘却了库里有这款游戏，然后就这款游戏就压箱底了。

接下来该说优点了，这款游戏拥有及其庞大的世界观，甚至涉及了v社另一款游戏系列portale，而且还上了PCgamer“史上最伟大游戏“的榜单，还拥有及其带感好的音乐，凭着几点，它足以成为史上最伟大的游戏，而且这还是v社开山制作，没有这款游戏就没有现在的steam，而且这还是反恐精英，胜利之日，军团要塞这些mod的原版就更有纪念价值了。

总结：可玩性：4/5        原因：对路痴极其不友好
           剧情：5/5           原因：因为具有完美而庞大的世界观和出色的剧情
           推荐指数：4.5/5原因：当卡关之后会变得索然无味，玩的我头疼，这对于我这种从不看攻略的菜鸡是不友好的，但没有路提示的好处就是代入感强。
  
ps:我打通的不是原版而是起源版，起源版和原版是一样的，只不过特效进行了重置
Good old Classic, still rocks

Half-Life: Opposing Force is an expansion pass to the Half-Life universe where you go thru all different kind of environments, killing monsters, finding new weapons, etc.
PROS AND CONS:
+ Great game length (8-12 hours)
+ Great sounds
+ Really good graphics for its time
+ Lovely Half-Life vibe
+ Cheap
+ Pure and balanced gameplay
+ Great gunfeel
+ Its half life lol

CONS:
- A few moments in the game can be a bit tedious

Overall: 9.5/10 Fantastic game. Although the game is old as hell it is still alot better then most FPS games from this time.

It's quite a hard game and it hasn't aged very well, but it is still enjoyable. The story is interesting and the weapons are fun to use. If you got the money for an old school game, you might wanna buy this.

Half-Life, an old gem and one of the best games to have ever been made, this game blew the FPS genre on its time and it's just amazing what it has to offer. This was one of my first FPS games and I can't recall how many times I did the campaign, had it cracked a while ago but I REALLY had to buy it on steam considering valve deserves any penny for this masterpiece, from the enemies, weapons, soundtracks, environment interactions, everything is impressively well done and it's mind blowing on how such an old game can have such characteristics that many games to this very same day can't achieve

A anos conheço Half-Life... Já fiquei muito admirado desde a primeira vez que joguei em época de lan house. Claro que o foco era o CS, mas Half-Life tinha o seu espaço reservado nas minhas horas pagas. Jogo de enredo muito complexo e misterioso. É difícil de entender completo o enredo zerando só uma vez. Fiz questão de comprar esse game agora nos tempos modernos para zera-lo mais uma vez e assim com a cabeça de hoje em dia conseguir entender melhor sobre a história. Sobre o gameplay ele é direto e com alguns pequenos loadings para carregar o restante do cenário. Jogabilidade é muito boa, por isso justificando o sucesso de CS. Pra mim, gráficos não é problema e não tenho isso de não jogar games antigos por causa de gráfico. O jogo tem uma certa dificuldade mesmo jogando no médio por conta do nível de HP baixo em alguns trechos deixando ele desafiador. Recomendo que salve o seu progresso manualmente antes de alguma grande batalha ou partes de riscos, pq se você morrer nesses pontos, o jogo vai te levar bem atrás tendo que fazer muita coisa tudo de novo kkk.
 Half-Life... um jogo que te deixa com várias perguntas, um jogo que te faz jogar prestando atenção em cada detalhe, um jogo que te permite fazer ''escolhas'' como salvar ou não alguém e assim em diante...  1998... um jogo desse em 1998... realmente é um marco no mundo dos games. Ainda tenho esperanças de um Half-Life 3, pq história pra contar, ainda tem muita. 
 Quem é G-Man? Ou melhor... o que é o G-Man? Qual o seu propósito? Porque ele faz o que faz?  São perguntas que só são respondidas em teorias pela internet.
 Bom... é isso. Com certeza recomendo para todos que curte essas histórias que te faz pensar, que curte FPS e principalmente para os amantes de CS. Pq foi daqui, de Half-Life, que surgiu um dos maiores fenômenos dos jogos de tiro em primeira pessoa.
 Obrigado pela atenção de todos.

WARNING! Carry on reading! Or you will die, even if you only looked at the word warning! Once there was a little girl called Clarissa, she was ten-years-old and she lived in a mental hospital, because she killed her mom and her dad. She got so bad she went to kill all the staff in the hospital so the More- government decided that best idea was to get rid of her so they set up a special room to kill her, as humane as possible but it went wrong the machine they were using went wrong. And she sat there in agony for hours until she died. Now every week on the day of her death she returns to the person that reads this letter, on a monday night at 12:00a.m. She creeps into your room and kills you slowly, by cutting you and watching you bleed to death. Now send this to ten other profiles on this one site, and she will haunt someone else who doesn't. This isn't fake. apparently, if u copy and paste this to ten comments in the next ten minutes u will have the best of your life. TIC TOC.

I didn't get to play this when I was a kid or when this was new. I'm literally 20 years late on playing this game. So here's a review from someone who doesn't have fond memories of this game.

It's actually pretty good. It's definitely better than a lot of the garbage that is released today. I'm honestly surprised this game turned out to be enjoyable. I thought it was just remembered super well and people didn't want to admit they're shitty game aged poorly. 

That all being said, this game is kinda hard and agitating. I usually don't get lost in games, with or without the map. I can remember where to go and what I needed to do in the past areas pretty well, but this one had me turn around a few times and go back towards something, in retrospect, that was super obvious I had missed the first time around.

The fps aspect is okay. I didn't really miss shots and wasn't super pushed to hit hard shots so I'm not sure why some people say it pushed their fps skills to their limits. 

All in all, expect a hard but nice old game.

Es totalmente imprecindible que tengas este juegaso! Osea si o si compralo, el multijugador sigue activo, la historia del juego es interesante e increible. Y ni hablar del Soundtrack que podés conseguir como DLC de forma gratuita. Puntuación 10/10. Recomendado.

Approximately 3,000 scientists were harmed (read: obliterated) in the telling of this story.

Disclaimer: I am approximately 20 years late playing this game. Valve had some big ideas and somehow executed them with the game-making equivalent of a shoe box and a paperclip. Hats off to you sirs and madams!

Cons: Dated graphics, jumping is hard, what-killed-me?-moments, where am I supposed to go?, oh this is a button I can press?, nausea due to aforementioned old time-y graphics, the end is too punishing and/or I am not good.

Pros: Terrifying noises and scares: I rarely start just RUNNING and SHOOTING and going “AHHHH!” but I did in this game. Does not take itself too seriously (Guard: Freeman, make sure you don’t - *gets blown up*). Able to Save at any time; I saved approximately every 4 seconds to reduce re-do rage.

I close with some words to live by from Black Mesa Security Guard: We might live longer if we work together. (Spoiler: He didn’t… but c’est la vie.)

Classic fps

Half-Life is the reason that Steam exists, it's a classic FPS that started this narrative revolution that's still going on even today. The storytelling is based on the environment and on the excellent gameplay, the soundtrack is amazing and the levels are very well designed. There are a lot of good mods that will keep the players busy after completing the main story, the multiplayer is also alive with couple hundreds players online all the time. This game should be in every steam collection.

Que decir de Half Life... uno de los mejores juegos de toda la historia.
- [b] Una ambientación fenomenal [/b]
- [b] enemigos tan tenebosos y bien hechos que te daran unos buenos sustos. [/b]

[u] En resumen [/u]
Un juego que tiene que estar si o si en tu biblioteca de Steam, que esperas para comprarlo?

Half-Life, is by far one of the best games I played in the past, and it still is the best game in my eyes, even though I only play it once a year, just to get the memories back up and running, doesn't mean I don't have enough time to play it, or I just hate it, it's because there's so many new games that I want to try out, and keep on playing over, and over again.

I may have about less than 5 hours on this game on Steam, but I played this game cracked back in the day, years, years ago, and I was even playing it against Friends, it was such fun good times that I can never ever forget about.

It's always Interesting re-visting this game, because each time I play it, it feels like a new fresh game, even though the models, textures etc.. Are not beautiful, infact, horrible but that doesn't mean I won't keep on playing it, because If I started playing it in the early morning, I must finish the game in the same day, or I'll never forgive myself, and I can finish the game in a few hours no worries.

To those who are interested in FPS, this one is a VERY old FPS, so don't expect much, and if you're looking for a Fast Action game, there can't be much at the start, but mostly you might come across a few enemies or just a pack of them, and there will be a lot of Navigating in this game, just incase, if you are looking for a Story-Related game, THIS game is a good one.

Because it has ended for a while, but it Continued in Half-Life 2, and it's Episodes. But, the last Episode of the game was left the community on a cliff hanger, the whole Half-Life Community was so disapointed and upset about it, everyone is still waiting, for the Half-Life 3 to come out, or even Half-Life 2: Episode 3 or come out, one of'em. Just to continue the story.

I am Recommending this game, 10/10 :)

Clasico de los clasicos, padre de los shooters y del conocido Counter Strike.
Un juego shooter que revoluciono al genero con su historia y mecanicas.
No me aburro nunca de jugarlo y ni hablar de us modo multijugador, que te hace pregunta quien mierda encendio la bomba en crossfire.
Su soundtrack y sus mapeados son excelentes, que decir, "uma delisia kkkk" y sus enemigos unicos e inolvidables, como olvidar las escenas de las ventilaciones con una mano al pecho para que no te agarre un infarto de cuando te salta el headcrab en tu cara.
Es un videojuego que le tengo mucho cariño, lo jugue muchas veces, lo daba vuelta y lo volvia a jugar, me pasa lo mismo que Half Life 2, lo podria jugar 10 veces y nunca me voy a aburrir, me resulta un videojuego muy rejugable y divertido, que te va a dar algo de nostalgia si lo jugaste de pibe.
Nostalgic. it was a very impressive game that showed that everything was not graphic.
I will continue to review this when Half Life 3 releases.
1999 год. Естественно топ!

1998 was a great year for gaming with games released such as Metal Gear Solid and the Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of time and of course Half Life 1 made from the yet relatively unknown developer team of Valve who were part of the Microsoft developer team then decided to make some of the most remarkable games in their respective genres. Today we still see Valves games as some of the best  with games such as Portal 1 and 2 and Counter Strike and Team Fortress still being relevant to this day. I can see how this game use to be revolutionary for it's time for not using cutscene for example to narrate a good story. However concering this steam version, the Quake engine seems very outdated and the game is buggy forcing me to look online for solutions for glitches that should not be in a game and were keeping me from progressing in the story. I think it's a damn shame for a game of the reputation where I was looking really forward to playing and experiencing all of the Half Life story and possibly be part of the crowd wshing for HL3. I guess I will just resume in watching some online game play of it and then continue with HL2.

Bende bunun 1.5 sürümü vardı.(İnternet kafe kopyası)
EFsane bir oyun. Hikaye ve o zamanın oyunlarına göre baya bir üstün. Ve modları muhteşem.
Neden  çok az saat oynadım çünkü bu oyunu küçüklüğümde bitirmiştim ve bitirdiğim yerleri gayet iyi hatırlıyorum.

Oyun çok gereksiz hoşumada gitmedi zaten almayın boşuna param boşuna gitti
Böyle oyunun taaa anasını sikeyim böyle bi mal oyun olamaz 1.85 tl verdim ama boşuna 18 tl verininb amk
BEST game Ever
Проезжаться по местным колоритам в течение 10 минут конечно очень интересно (нет),  а ещё застрять на пути в воротах в сраном поезде, спасибо за годноту.

Что ж, я таки прошел эту игру. Даже спустя 20 ! лет после выхода, она способна удивить. Представляю какой резонанс был в 1998 году. Игра не зря заслужила свою славу. Игра заставляет пошевелить мозгами, а не просто пострелять в монстров и спецназовцев. Думаю за эти годы уже сказано о всех плюсах этой игры.
Так что Габен на то время потрудился на славу.

※日本語パッチあてたのでプレイ時間はおかしくなってます。

100円なら遊んでみてもいいかもしれません。
不愉快な挙動による操作性の悪さと３Ｄ酔いを誘引する
左右移動の滑る慣性は、クラシックを楽しめないと
苦行になりかねません。

普通に遊んでいて、辛かったのは上下エレベータのギミックで
挟まって動けなくなるスタックポイントです。
これはどのエレベーターや足場でも起こる可能性があり、
上下する足場の手前では必ずクイックセーブしないと、
後悔する事になります。なりました。

また、レバーをひいた時に、その小さなレバーにひっかかって
動けなくなるなどのバグも沢山あります。
これはバグというより初期のソースエンジンの仕様かも。

進行ルートのひっかけはノーヒントでは難しい、意地悪な物が
多く、答えを見ても「あっ、それか」と納得できる物ではなく
「こんなの判るかよ」と溜息をつく感じです。

敵はやたらと固く、必然的に弾数は少なく、敵からの一発は
致命的と難易度はとても高く。
ラスト近くでは殆ど補給も無いのでストレスとの戦いも
入ってきます。おそらく、意図されたものです。

それらの事を我慢すれば、多いステージ数と各ステージ毎の
テーマにそったギミックと演出は楽しめました。
今のエンジンで遊びやすく作れば、とても遊びやすく
なると思いますが、この理不尽さがクラシックの
懐かしさであり、お値段がお手頃になる理由でもあり……。

ストーリー的には……
大事故が発生！　なんとか生き延びないと＜わかる
怪物が出てきたので倒さないと＜わかる
軍隊が敵とかお約束かよ＜わかる
なんとか基地から逃げ出さないと＜わかる
研究施設までいけば助かるらしいぞ＜わかる
この事態を収拾しなければ＜逃げる話じゃなかったの！？
やつらをやっつけてくれ＜どうしてこうなった……
君だけが頼りだ敵を滅ぼせ＜話の繋がりがよく見えないんですけど

色んな意味で楽しめました。
この話、いったいどうなるのさって方向で。

最後のステージだけで一時間近くかかるのは大変でした。
武器弾薬の補給がなくとも、カタナがあればなんとか
なるはず（シャドゥウォリアー感）
まぁぷるぷるしてる系のを使えって事なんですが。

Excelente juego de la vieja escuela. Invento varias cosas que hoy en dia damos por sentadas, como el tomar objetos, romperlos, hacer que PNJ interactuen, poder eliminar PJs q son valiosos en el desarrollo de la historia y, automaticamente, perder....en fin, mil cosas que podria seguir enumerando. HL es un clasico obligado para todo aquel que se precie de ser un autentico GAMER, y mucho mas para aquellos que se cataloguen "de la vieja escuela". Jueguen ESTA JOYA...Estan obligados ya que usan STEAM, malditos burros!!!
